text:
⇨ When President Trump warned Congress about COVID-19, Democrats were impeaching him.

⇨ When he shut down flights from China, Joe Biden was calling him a racist.

⇨ And now, Democrats are still working against him rather than 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 him as he starts to rebuild the economy.
